website_summaries.verdict: Based on the varied reviews it has received, the Under Armour SpeedForm Gemini 3 Graphic was neither a hit or miss with the market. On the one hand, the shoe was praised for its thorough construction and efficient performance. On the other hand, complaints were made about structural details and price. Overall, the shoe has met user expectations with just a few criticisms.
pros: There was an exceptional grip on the outsole, a buyer remarked
One runner was thoroughly impressed with the supportive structure of the shoe that they likened it to “walking on sunshine.”
Many users agreed that the SpeedForm Gemini 3 Graphic was a lightweight shoe
Various wearers described the shoe as comfortable
The shoe performed well in other activities aside from running, mentioned a customer
cons: The toe box of this shoe was smaller than the first release, according to a wearer
The shoe made the shins stiff and sore after each wear, a user observed
Some customers thought the SpeedForm Gemini 3 Graphic was an expensive shoe
The laces did not do an excellent job of keeping the foot secure, a runner claimed

customer_reviews.title: Nice sneakers but high price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sneakers but too small. Also, just one size up is nearly $30.00 more in price. I re ordered the larger size directly from UnderArmour.com and they were less expensive for the correct size (in fact less expensive all together) with free shipping also! Not right to charge more money for a bigger size...in fact, one size bigger at that. I thought amazon.com had the least expensive price but I guess that isn't always the case. It pays to research so I am not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Darstein

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe but not wide enough.
customer_reviews.text: Shoe Quality as expected from Under Armour good and light. A few things to note, the insole is non removable, means that it is built into the shoe. Most important for those with wide feet like me this shoe is definitely not wide enough although it is advertised as wide fit, and its printed on the box but compared to other brands i have owned, Asics, New Balance and 5.11, this shoe is slimmer. Under Armour has very few wide shoes in their Product range apparently the "wide" market is not big enough for economies of scale.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: It works okay... jumps up & down ...
customer_reviews.text: It works okay... jumps up & down a bit, but its not anyone else's fault but mine. I ordered it a 1/2 size to big because of my extra wide feet without realizing that the sneaker would be wide enough without the extra 1/2 a size.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald O. Parsons

customer_reviews.title: Rub the back of your heals.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look and they are very light. Unfortunately, the lack of padding on the upper heal causes them to rub pretty badly and leave blisters. I'm hoping with more wear this will go away, but so far they are not as comfortable as they could be.
customer_reviews.author: Many Interests

customer_reviews.title: UA’s Best Model Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best fitting UA shoe they make! I have been wearing UA shoes for years, and the Speedform is by far their best and most comfortable shoe! I purchased 4-pair of different colors fearing UA may discontinue this model!! Runs true to size and plenty wide! I highly recommend this shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Don Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pairs of these now. They come in half sizes (mine 12-1/2). A 12 is usually too small and 13 too loose. These are one of the only sneakers that fit. I wear them all day, and the comfort is like a pair of slippers.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are comfortable and stylish. Not bad for the price. The only drawback is the toe of the shoe. It has wrinkles or stretch marks that sort of detracts from the shoe. It might just be my pair. I also ordered the green shoes and received the blue pair. The company offered to refund and ship them back but the blue were stylish enough to not bother with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D.

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe, the sizing might run a little large.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, but this one ran a little too big for me. I had the original speedform gemini's and the fit was great, (I had size 11, even though most brands I wear a 10) and the fit was good, probably gonna half to go down half a size (even though the fit on my street encounter IV's was perfect in an 11)
customer_reviews.author: Seth Monholand

customer_reviews.title: So Far They Work
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are lightweight and fit as expected which is what I was seeking. However, sides of shoe feel and look like cloth material. I plan to wear these shoes in all types of weather. Wondering how well they will hold up in raining or wet conditions.
customer_reviews.author: artcal

customer_reviews.title: buy a size larger than you would normally buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the size I normally buy for running shoes, but these shoes run a bit smaller that expected so not so good for running also the the heal has little to no padding and would cause blisters. That being said I like these for every day use to wear with casual clothing and if I would of bought them with that in mind I would of given them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: David Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe so much I bought a second pair. My first are still going strong after 200 miles. This shoe has felt great on every run whether it’s a speed, recovery or long run up to 15 miles. They are a little stiff out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: I_myself_me

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, comfortable and fashionable...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. This is my first pair of Under Armour sneakers and I must say, if they hold up well, I’ll be buying more for sure. I used to buy Nike’s but it was time for a brand change. I wear 13 EEE usually and these fit great.
customer_reviews.author: B.A.

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the shoe. The back rubs the back of my foot a bit, but hopefully after a few more wears it will get better.
customer_reviews.author: T. A.

customer_reviews.title: These are double wide shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return them. These shoes are double wides, not clear when I ordered them. The size on the pulldown screen said D width. The 2E on the label isn't referring to the graphics, it is some kind of reference to the width.
customer_reviews.author: Poseidon

customer_reviews.title: I am not a avid runner but found that these felt great during a run
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gym only shoe to keep in my bag in my car. I am not a avid runner but found that these felt great during a run. They fit well and do not slip.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Sowa

customer_reviews.title: Really great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really great all around shoe! I only used to wear these to the gym but I loved them so much that I started wearing them all the time! I got them in white, cause they were on sale, and they did get dirty after a couple months. Very comfortable to wear even with my flat feet. It also forms nice with the foot when they are laced up too. I do have to wear a heavy duty ankle brace and still didn't notice any discomfort. Overall a great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G Devino

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I now have three pair. The design is great... get many compliments. I use them for multiple sports. Not a big runner anymore so can't comment on that but overall a very comfortable shoe. I use for pickle ball and they hold up great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Broderick

customer_reviews.title: Son loves these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage son. He loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Twins Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes. Great for people who spend long periods of time walking at work. I'm a nurse, and these shoes are a great relief for my feet. Totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Looks Dirty
customer_reviews.text: The material over the front of the shoe is not white. It is sort of an off white, and it looks dirty compared to the bright white of the rest of the shoe. Feels great though, but I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kev

customer_reviews.title: Good Fit
customer_reviews.text: I Love the shoe, but it is a bit pricey. It is however VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Markman

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable, Look Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable running shoes that look great. I do have only one area of concern. The heels can be quite sharp and cause irritation so avoid ankle sock while running in these.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY pleased with how this shoe fits and feels
customer_reviews.text: I am VERY pleased with how this shoe fits and feels. I also like the styling. I am more then likely going to order a second pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ghani

customer_reviews.title: ... for Christmas they were on sale and they were great he loves them and they fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband for Christmas they were on sale and they were great he loves them and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Michelle DiAntonio

customer_reviews.title: they look good
customer_reviews.text: i returned this the heel area is not padded which is a very big problem for me i wish i could keep this
customer_reviews.author: turki

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good around the town shoe, didn't fit the way I like to fit in order to wear to the gym. Comfortable though with great quality
customer_reviews.author: Spence A

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Another gift for my husband and he loved them! He never shops and buys ugly shoes all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Crazydanelady

customer_reviews.title: Truly great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. One of the most comfortable pair of shoes I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Loren Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, too long
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little longer than expected. Really nice look though. Good fabric, nice color combination. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: SwimBikeRun

customer_reviews.title: Shop for the best deal
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are now on clearance for less. Otherwise terrific value. Super happy with weight and feel.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Sehgal

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife as she needs a wider foot bed. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Chaffee

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Under Armour shoes. 4 stars on these just because they took some breaking in to be comfortable. Usually Under Armour's are good to go right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: I have a pair of the gemini 2s and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of the gemini 2s and I bought these due to not finding a replacement. These are the same size but fit a little loose.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ankle support is pretty good; the top portion of the shoe is somewhat flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Ebbi Hamidieh

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: My son has wide feet and usually has difficulty finding the right pair. He loves these!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good, first time buying UA shoes
customer_reviews.text: Felt a bit bigger than expected so don't go over your real size
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Carmona

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit good, insole is a lil thin, but overall shoe is comfy to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: frederic spears

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my grandson he loves the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: These are my 2nd pair. Comfortable and durable. I will be buying a third pair in the future.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoe at the right price.  Unfortunately I could not get comfortable in these shoes
customer_reviews.text: 👍🏼..light weight & looks good 👎🏼...very uncomfortable. Not like the original Gemini running shoes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly good price if your flexible with color my 2nd pair with about 600 miles love these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoe, great price point!
customer_reviews.text: For around $40 this item is comfortable and fits as expected. This value was hard to pass up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: back of the heal rubbing a painful
customer_reviews.text: It rubbed a sore on the back of my heals. It hurts.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: They fit my son perfectly and look awesome! Great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fit looks and value are all a good thing. Only reason for 4 stars that there ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear an extra large shoe, (4E), up until these i have had to wear another brand because they were about the only ones who made 4e shoes. I happened to stumble across these, ordered them and wore them for the 1st time. The comfort level was outstanding! Fit looks and value are all a good thing. Only reason for 4 stars that there are just a coupla of different shoes that are 4e in size and that most everything else was out of stock on Amazon that i would of like to have had. I am very hopeful that Under Armour will consider making more choices available in extra wide shoes.
customer_reviews.author: streetrodder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and lightweight. Could use more arch support and narrow in the toe region.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to fit
customer_reviews.text: True to size and width, plenty of room in toe. Love these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Sasala

customer_reviews.title: but it has good amount cushion for impact absorbance
customer_reviews.text: Slightly stiffer than the Gemini2, but it has good amount cushion for impact absorbance. It is a long distance running shoe and I love it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: The size is a bit small and it's hurting. ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is a bit small and it's hurting. I tried the shoes one month after buying and I am unable to exchange them now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are much stiffer than my Gemini 2.1 shoes ... much prefer them over these.
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Boerder

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: The insole is softer than what I was expecting and the ​shoe itself is thinner than I expected, too. Overall, good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly what you want in a tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson and he tells me they are great fit perfect and are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Susan Guilford

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: was looking for a running shoe for long and the search ended here. Fit as expected and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J S

product_meta.title: Under Armour Speedform Gemini 3 Graphic Running, Men's Shoes
product_meta.description: STYLE CORSA: ultra-cushioned neutral shoe designed to offer unparalleled comfort The innovative Under Armour SpeedForm structure shapes itself on the foot for a precise fit, eliminating any distraction The panel in Threadborne material in the central part of the foot offers structure and a distinctive style Structured mesh tongue and mask to improve fit and increase ventilation The internal buttress ensures optimal structure and support combined with lightness Built-in midsole for greater cushioning and support and for perfect comfort Charged Cushioning insole uses compressed foam for even greater responsiveness and durability, optimal cushioning and maximum energy return Micro G foam in the heel provides greater protection and stabilization The rubber blown under the forefoot is light but incredibly reactive The highly abrasion-resistant rubber positioned under the heel helps absorb the contact with the ground Differential: 8 mm Weight: 280 g
feature_bullets: The innovative Under Armour SpeedForm structure shapes itself on the foot for a precise fit, eliminating any distraction
The panel in Threadborne material in the central part of the foot offers structure and a distinctive style
Structured mesh tongue and mask to improve fit and increase ventilation
The internal buttress ensures optimal structure and support combined with lightness
Built-in midsole for greater cushioning and support and for perfect comfort
